title: + Dropbox Moving the world’s files http: //www.getdropbox.com

narrative_script.narration: Welcome to + Dropbox Moving the world’s files http: //www.getdropbox.com. In this presentation, we'll explore an innovative solution to a significant challenge.

The problem we're addressing is clear: Why better? e Solves the entire genre of storage- related problems with one app ¢ Deep OS integration, visual feedback ¢ Doesn’t make you change the way you work ¢ Open APIs to link desktop & web applications
What did they screw up? e Only tackle small pieces of the problem ¢ Poor technical execution e Clumsy, verbose & technical Uls; require configuration e Lack of distribution, partners
Compelling content Engage the header with doto.  Ah are ss Emotive Reduce imagery text less is MORE here.

Our solution is straightforward yet powerful: What are people doing now? e Email attachments e USB drives ¢e Browser uploads e Piecemeal solutions
Business model e Individuals: freeemium ¢ SMB: shared folder per-seat license (replaces backup, Windows file share, collaboration tools, reduces IT headcount) e Platform: broker all UGC from the desktop to the web
Platform ¢ Onramp for all UGC from desktop > web ¢e Convenient for users: drag and drop instead of sign-in and browser upload ¢ Beneficial for web apps: more content uploaded, less friction & fewer failures ¢ Bigger picture: all files in Dropbox, delegate access to web apps
Customer acquisition ¢ Loved by early adopters/beta users (natural influencers) ¢ Free accounts for individuals ¢ Viral elements: file sharing, shared folders, photo/media galleries ¢ Platform, partnerships > free customer acquisition.
We've analyzed the competitive landscape and identified our unique advantages.
Our team brings together the expertise and experience needed to execute our vision.
Thank you for your attention. We believe our solution addresses a critical need and represents a compelling investment opportunity.
